robotkaposzta_textmanagerbehavior.name: Text Manager
robotkaposzta_textmanagerbehavior.description: Behavior to load language data from Text Manager plugin.

key.name: Key
key.desc: A key name to load language data.

lang.name: Language
lang.desc: Optional the language to load language data.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.desc: Whether the behavior is initally enabled

set-key-value.description: Add a character to coding scheme.

key-value.name: Key value
key-value.desc: The key new value. Note: language data will change too.

set-lang-value.description: Add a character to coding scheme.

lang-value.name: Language value
lang-value.desc: The language new value. Note: language data will change too.

set-enabled.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

state.name: State
state.desc: The key new value. Note: language data will change too.

key-value.description: Return a value of the translation key.

lang-value.description: Return a value of the translation language.
